mapper.sql: ResidentId, StaffId, HouseId, StaffName, Address, HouseRel, BookTime, StaffNo, StaffSex, StaffDeptId, StaffDeptName, StaffSpouseName, HouseNo, HouseType, HouseTypeName, StaffType, StaffTypeName, BuildArea, UsedArea, HouseFinishTime, BuildingName, FamilyCode, ExpireTime, LastRentTime, RentType, IsDelete
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from view_hs_resident
order by ${orderByClause}
SELECT DISTINCT StaffId FROM view_hs_resident WHERE StaffId IN(SELECT StaffId FROM view_hs_resident WHERE IsDelete = FALSE GROUP BY StaffId HAVING COUNT(StaffId) > 1)
mapper.insert: insert into view_hs_resident (ResidentId, StaffId, HouseId, StaffName, Address, HouseRel, BookTime, StaffNo, StaffSex, StaffDeptId, StaffDeptName, StaffSpouseName, HouseNo, HouseType, HouseTypeName, StaffType, StaffTypeName, BuildArea, UsedArea, HouseFinishTime, BuildingName, FamilyCode, ExpireTime, LastRentTime, RentType, IsDelete) values (#{residentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{staffId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{houseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{staffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{houseRel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{staffNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffDeptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{staffDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffSpouseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{houseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{houseType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{houseTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{staffTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buildArea,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{usedArea,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{houseFinishTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{buildingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{familyCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{expireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastRentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT})

ResidentId = #{record.residentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
